CommandDefinition.Name: addfilter
CommandDefinition.Description: Register a filter. The filter uses all shared libraries of its associated trigger.

Argument.Name: filterName
Argument.Description: The name of the filter to be added

Argument.Name: fqClassName
Argument.Description: The fully qualified name of the filter class

Argument.Name: triggerName
Argument.Description: The trigger that this filter is associated with

Argument.Name: sharedLibs
Argument.Description: A set of shared libraries required by the implementation

Argument.Name: jarFiles
Argument.Description: A set of jar files required by the implementation

BoolOption.Name: v
BoolOption.Description: Print verbose output of the state after the operation has finished.
